item.title: Building A Faster & Accurate COVID Search Engine with TransformersðŸ¤—
item.author: Author
item.description: Abstract This article will let you build a faster and accurate COVID Search Engine using TransformersðŸ¤— Introduction In this article, we will build a search engine, which will not only retrieve and rank the articles based on the query but also give us the response, along with a 1000 words context around the response. To achieve this, we will need: a structured dataset with reserach papers and its full text.
